Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ following \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to \SW-Awaiting EIC Decision\ after \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ occurrences per case
Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ before \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ is sent
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities that occur after \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in the most common process variant
Percentage of cases with \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ that also have \Plagiarism Originality Report Completed\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in relation to the total number of activities in the longest process variant
Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ followed by \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\ in a loop of reviewer assignment and agreement
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in cases that exceed the average performance time from submission to decision
Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ out of all reviewer-related activities
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-Reviewer Declined', 'SW-Reviewer No Response', 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable', 'SW-Reviewer Agreed']"}"

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ leading to a decision of \SW-EIC Accept\ or \SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit\
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'total', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit']"}"

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in manuscripts that required major revision (\SW-EIC Major Revision\) versus those that were accepted (\SW-EIC Accept\)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-EIC Major Revision', 'SW-EIC Accept']"}"

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in cases that were eventually published versus those that were rejected or required resubmission
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit', 'SW-EIC Major Revision']"}"
